text:
Although the incident was resolved,
the scars of the damage still remained
at the ceremony hall of Archimedes Colony.

Rapid restoration work was being carried out,
primarily by the heroes themselves,
and the solemn atmosphere was gradually being restored.

Having finished the day's work and disbanded,
[Player] was called over by a certain person.

name: Pubraseer
text:
—[Player], good work.
Sorry to bother you after work,
but may I have a moment with you?

options.text: Pubraseer-san, thank you for your hard work too!

name: Pubraseer
text:
I don't have any particular business,
but I wanted to talk to you for a bit.

name: Pubraseer
text:
The aftermath of that incident
has finally settled down.
...Is your body alright?

Pubraseer walked over to the observation lounge
connected to the ceremony hall and sat down next to [Player].

options.text: I'm fine now, sorry for worrying you.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, that's good to hear.
When I heard you lost consciousness
and were drifting in space—

name: Pubraseer
text:
I must admit, my blood ran cold.
...Please take care of your body.

Saying that,
Pubraseer clasped [Player]'s hand,
with a worried look on his face.

name: Pubraseer
text:
To see you safe and sound...
I am truly glad.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Surely, my friends must have
felt the same way when
I was about to collapse.

Saying that, Pubraseer gently
caressed the pendant on his chest.

options.text: They were comrades who cared about their captain, weren't they?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Ah, they are my proud comrades.
A very unique group, always lively and noisy—

name: Pubraseer
text:
The time I spent with them
brought me much comfort.
...I wanted to introduce them to you too.

Pubraseer smiled quietly.
Seeing his smile, [Player] squeezed Pubraseer's hand back.

options.text: I have a favor to ask...
Could you show me that form again?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, that hero suit.
Of course, it's the form
you observed of me, after all.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I was also thinking
of asking you a favor just the same.

In response to Pubraseer's words,
[Player] operated their device and transformed.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—Indeed, this form does make me
feel like I've returned to the past.
...How is it, does it suit me?

options.text: It suits you, and it's cool!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Thank you, [Player].
I'm very happy.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
But, when you say that directly to my face...
It's a little embarrassing.

To [Player], who nodded with a smile,
Pubraseer smiled back and traced the five jewels with his finger.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...My life, which my friends protected—
is present here and now.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
That's how I was able to meet you.
...And, I was able to show you this form of me.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I will continue to hold onto
the hope they entrusted to me.
...That is what I can do now.

Pubraseer held his saber in front of his chest and closed his eyes.
In the brief silence, he expressed his gratitude and wishes for his friends.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...I must look to the future, and,
together with my new comrades, set forth.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Not to part with my friends,
—but to step into the future,
together with them.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...I've had regrets until now,
but I've finally found my own
answer to my friends' wishes.

When he opened his eyes, the jewels glowed faintly,
as if responding to Pubraseer, holding a gentle light.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...For me, Orbiter, who
aims to be an astronaut—
his innocent wish was a bit too dazzling.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...That's why, being able to
watch over Orbiter and his determination
also brought me much joy.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—Surely, my friends would have
wished for that too.

Pubraseer sheathed his saber
and turned to [Player].

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Though it was a team formed by chance,
Orbiter, Denebola, Gaisei, Yotaro—

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
And you, [Player].
Getting to fight together with everyone,
that is an irreplaceable memory for me.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I ended up forcing a
great burden on you, but...
Once again, please allow me to thank you.

options.text: I'm glad I could fight with you too.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...[Player].
Ah, I can't win against you.
...Truly, thank you.

Pubraseer smiled happily.
Then, he stood up and knelt before [Player].

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
—[Player].
Having you as a friend
is one of my greatest joy.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Pushing my comrades forward,
traveling to space together,
and safely returning to the moon—

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
You fulfilled a dream that
I couldn't possibly achieve in the past.
...Thank you.

Pubraseer quietly took [Player]'s hand.
And then, his mouth touched the back of their hand.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...To me, this is what
happiness feels like.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Heheh, a friend told me the same thing.
—But, this is how I truly feel.

text:
Pubraseer smiled and,
without another word, embraced [Player].

Pubraseer's warmth, his living heartbeat,
transferred from his chest to theirs.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...[Player].
Your body has grown cold.
I'm sorry, I wasn't thoughtful.

Pubraseer gently put his arm around [Player]'s shoulder,
and draped his own jacket over them.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...With this, you won't be cold, right?
[Player], are you alright?

Pubraseer's scent and
warmth enveloped [Player].

A sense of comfort and relief
spread deep within their chest.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
It must be a bit cold here.
...If you'd like, after this,
would you come to my room?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...No, that's not right.
[Player], would you stay by my side
for just a little longer?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I want to talk to you much more.
...I want to spend time with you,
to gaze at the stars with you.

Leaning closer to [Player],
Pubraseer smiled shyly.

options.text: ...I want to spend time together too.
Pubraseer-san, I feel the same way.

text:
At those words,
Pubraseer pulled [Player] closer.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Sorry.
I really can't control
how much I want you.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...But, this is also a part of me.
I want to feel your warmth.
...Please, if you'd let me engrave it into me deeply.

Pubraseer's breathing could be heard.
The warmth of his body, his strong heartbeat,
transferred through them.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...[Player]. When I'm with you,
I gain more memories I don't want to lose.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...And, if possible,
I want you to remember me forever.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I swear not to forget this feeling.
—I want to live my future life with you.

options.text: I'm happy you feel that way.

text:
—Looking down at Earth from the observation lounge,
[Player] and Pubraseer smiled faintly at each other,
held hands, and stood side by side.

And, with intertwined fingers, assuring each other,
the two walked on the red carpet.

As if to bless the two,
meteors sparkled in the starry sky.
